title: Battle Royale, Vol. 14
description: The beginning of the end!Shuuya, Kawada, and Noriko fight for their lives against Kiriyama, the psychotic student who decimated most of their class. While Kiriyama strives to eradicate the other kids' futures, we get an insider's view of Kiriyama's past... and what forces shaped this bright, talented young man into the unfeeling killer he is today.
author: Koushun Takami
